price: 12. Diggah nanu rabtem inkih naynuwweeh, addunyal maqaanék umaanék uysukummu heenim kee ken raatitte naktubeh, kaadu ummaanim baxxaqqa-le kitaabal (lowcal macfuuz kinnuk) lowsisne (ixxisne).
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نُحۡيِ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَنَكۡتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُواْ وَءَاثَٰرَهُمۡۚ وَكُلَّ شَيۡءٍ أَحۡصَيۡنَٰهُ فِيٓ إِمَامٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nuḥ'yī al-mawtā wanaktubu mā qaddamū waāthārahum wakulla shayin aḥṣaynāhu fī imāmin mubīnin
